article.title: U.S. Army Purchases New Mobile Radio to Support Sites in Korea
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Motorola Solutions Incorporated, Columbia, Maryland, was awarded an $8,232,445 firm-fixed-price contract a new land mobile radio system to support designated sites in Korea.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
